short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy lil extension for Webflow developers. Provides quality-of-life upgrades for building in Webflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★ Workspace Manager

Reorder, rename, and re-icon your workspaces from the dashboard.

★ CMS Panel Controls

Collapse and expand CMS panels, giving you more workspace when needed. And, use a dedicated button to close the CMS.

★ Publish Notifications

Visual indicators in your browser's favicon show the publish status of your project.

★ Dropdown Titles

Full titles on hover of dropdown items to show full names that may be truncated.
